discriptions.replace:
More about SpotX


{0} GithubSpotX-Windows
SpotX-Mac/Linux

{1} TelegramSpotX Community
SpotX Channel

{2} FAQWindows
Mac/Linux

DISCLAIMER

SpotX is a modified version of the official Spotify client, provided as an evaluation version, you use it at your own risk.

InAppMessaging.name: enableInAppMessaging
InAppMessaging.description: Disable pop-up window for premium account purchase

ContentInformationMessage.name: enableContentInformationMessage
ContentInformationMessage.native_description: Enable showing content information messages for episodes

PickShuffle.name: enablePickAndShuffle
PickShuffle.description: Removes restrictions on using the queue and listening to tracks in order

MusicLeavebehinds.name: enableDesktopMusicLeavebehinds
MusicLeavebehinds.native_description: Enable music leavebehinds on eligible playlists for desktop

HptoLocationRefactor.name: enableHptoLocationRefactor
HptoLocationRefactor.description: Disabling in some cases the banner on the main page
HptoLocationRefactor.native_description: Enable new permanent location for HPTO iframe to HptoHtml.js

UserFraudVerificationRequest.name: enableUserFraudVerificationRequest
UserFraudVerificationRequest.native_description: Enable the IAV component make api requests

EsperantoMigration.name: enableEsperantoMigration
EsperantoMigration.description: presumably, the advertising management transition from Cosmos to Esperanto
EsperantoMigration.native_description: Enable esperanto Migration for Ad Formats

RightSidebarMerchFallback.name: enableRightSidebarMerchFallback
RightSidebarMerchFallback.description: Allow merch to fallback to artist level merch if track level does not exist
RightSidebarMerchFallback.native_description: Allow merch to fallback to artist level merch if track level does not exist

ReportPodcastShows.name: enableReportPodcastShows
ReportPodcastShows.description: Enable Report action for podcast shows
ReportPodcastShows.native_description: Enable Report action for podcast shows

ReportPodcastEpisodes.name: enableReportPodcastEpisodes
ReportPodcastEpisodes.description: Enable Report action for podcast episodes
ReportPodcastEpisodes.native_description: Enable Report action for podcast episodes

ReportAudiobookChapters.name: enableReportAudiobookChapters
ReportAudiobookChapters.description: Enable Report action for audiobook chapters
ReportAudiobookChapters.native_description: Enable Report action for audiobook chapters

Dsa.name: enableDsa
Dsa.description: Enable showing DSA (Digital Services Act) context menu and modal for ads
Dsa.native_description: Enable showing DSA (Digital Services Act) context menu and modal for ads

Dsa2.name: enableDsaAds
Dsa2.description: Enable showing DSA (Digital Services Act) context menu and modal for ads
Dsa2.native_description: Enable showing DSA (Digital Services Act) context menu and modal for ads

Dsa3.name: enableDSASetting
Dsa3.description: Enable DSA (Digital Service Act) features for desktop and web
Dsa3.native_description: Enable DSA (Digital Service Act) features for desktop and web

NewAdsNpvVideoTakeover.name: enableNewAdsNpvVideoTakeover
NewAdsNpvVideoTakeover.description: Enable redesigned VideoTakeover for new ads NPV
NewAdsNpvVideoTakeover.native_description: Enable redesigned VideoTakeover for new ads NPV

NewAdsNpvColorExtraction.name: enableNewAdsNpvColorExtraction
NewAdsNpvColorExtraction.description: Enable CTA card color extraction for new ads NPV
NewAdsNpvColorExtraction.native_description: Enable CTA card color extraction for new ads NPV

NewAdsNpvNewVideoTakeoverSlot.name: enableNewAdsNpvNewVideoTakeoverSlot
NewAdsNpvNewVideoTakeoverSlot.description: Enable new modal slot to position redesigned new ads NPV VideoTakeover above all areas except RightSidebar and NPB
NewAdsNpvNewVideoTakeoverSlot.native_description: Enable new modal slot to position redesigned new ads NPV VideoTakeover above all areas except RightSidebar and NPB

FraudLoadSignals.name: enableFraudLoadSignals
FraudLoadSignals.description: Enable user fraud signals emitted on page load
FraudLoadSignals.native_description: Enable user fraud signals emitted on page load

GabitoAdEvent.name: enableGabitoAdEvent
GabitoAdEvent.description: Use Gabito AdEvent instead of Gabo AdEvent
GabitoAdEvent.native_description: Use Gabito AdEvent instead of Gabo AdEvent

YourListeningUpsell.name: enableYourListeningUpsell
YourListeningUpsell.description: Enable Your Listening Upsell Banner for free & unauth users
YourListeningUpsell.native_description: Enable Your Listening Upsell Banner for free & unauth users

podcast-ads.name: podcastads-ads_npb
podcast-ads.description: Enable the podcast ads Now Playing Bar experience, including features like the podcast ad Now Playing Bar hat
podcast-ads.native_description: Enable the podcast ads Now Playing Bar experience, including features like the podcast ad Now Playing Bar hat

podcast-episode.name: podcastaudioplus-episode_entity
podcast-episode.description: Enable the Sponsored By section on the Episode Page with Call to Action cards
podcast-episode.native_description: Enable the Sponsored By section on the Episode Page with Call to Action cards

podcast-show_page.name: podcastaudioplus-show_page
podcast-show_page.description: Enable show sponsors section on the Show Page
podcast-show_page.native_description: Enable show sponsors section on the Show Page

betamaxAutoSeekToAdPosition.name: AutoSeekToAdPosition
betamaxAutoSeekToAdPosition.description: If true, the player will seek to the ad position when an stop position is registered. Usefull for debugging ads.
betamaxAutoSeekToAdPosition.native_description: If true, the player will seek to the ad position when an stop position is registered. Usefull for debugging ads.

PodcastSponsoredContent.name: enablePodcastSponsoredContent
PodcastSponsoredContent.description: Enable sponsored content information for podcasts
PodcastSponsoredContent.native_description: Enable sponsored content information for podcasts

HomeAds.name: enableHomeAds
HomeAds.description: Enable Fist Impression Takeover ads on Home Page
HomeAds.native_description: Enable Fist Impression Takeover ads on Home Page

BillboardEsperantoMigration.name: enableBillboardEsperantoMigration
BillboardEsperantoMigration.description: Enable esperanto migration for Billboard Ad Format
BillboardEsperantoMigration.native_description: Enable esperanto migration for Billboard Ad Format

LeaderboardEsperantoMigration.name: enableEsperantoMigrationLeaderboard
LeaderboardEsperantoMigration.description: Enable esperanto Migration for Leaderboard Ad Format
LeaderboardEsperantoMigration.native_description: Enable esperanto Migration for Leaderboard Ad Format

SponsoredPlaylistEsperantoMigration.name: enableSponsoredPlaylistEsperantoMigration
SponsoredPlaylistEsperantoMigration.description: Enable esperanto Migration for Sponsored Playlist Ad Formats
SponsoredPlaylistEsperantoMigration.native_description: Enable esperanto Migration for Sponsored Playlist Ad Formats

SwitchingBetweenHomeAdsAndHpto.name: allowSwitchingBetweenHomeAdsAndHpto
SwitchingBetweenHomeAdsAndHpto.description: Allow switching between the new Home Ads format and legacy HPTO format (as opposed to only showing the legacy HPTO format)
SwitchingBetweenHomeAdsAndHpto.native_description: Allow switching between the new Home Ads format and legacy HPTO format (as opposed to only showing the legacy HPTO format)

ArtistNPVImpressionsLogging.name: enableArtistNPVImpressions
ArtistNPVImpressionsLogging.description: Enables impression logging for the Artist About section in NPV
ArtistNPVImpressionsLogging.native_description: Enables impression logging for the Artist About section in NPV

EnhanceLikedSongs.name: enableEnhanceLikedSongs
EnhanceLikedSongs.native_description: Enable Enhance Liked Songs UI and functionality

EnhancePlaylist.name: enableEnhancePlaylistProd
EnhancePlaylist.native_description: Enable Enhance Playlist UI and functionality for end-users

BrowseViaPathfinder.name: enableBrowseViaPathfinder
BrowseViaPathfinder.description: Fixes a bug on the genres page

IgnoreInRecommendations.name: enableIgnoreInRecommendations
IgnoreInRecommendations.native_description: Enable Ignore In Recommendations for desktop and web

Equalizer.name: enableEqualizer
Equalizer.description: Enable audio equalizer for Desktop and Web Player
Equalizer.native_description: Enable audio equalizer for Desktop and Web Player

CarouselsOnHome.name: enableCarouselsOnHome
CarouselsOnHome.description: Directly related to the blocking of podcasts and sections similar to ads on the main page

AttackOnTitanEaster.name: enableAttackOnTitanEasterEgg
AttackOnTitanEaster.description: Enable Attack on Titan Easter egg turning progress bar red when playing official soundtrack
AttackOnTitanEaster.native_description: Enable Attack on Titan Easter egg turning progress bar red when playing official soundtrack

AlbumReleaseAnniversaries.name: enableAlbumReleaseAnniversaries
AlbumReleaseAnniversaries.description: Enable showing balloons on album release date anniversaries
AlbumReleaseAnniversaries.native_description: Enable showing balloons on album release date anniversaries

MadeForYou.name: enableMadeForYouEntryPoint
MadeForYou.description: Show 'Made For You' entry point in the left sidebar
MadeForYou.native_description: Show 'Made For You' entry point in the left sidebar

ClearAllDownloads.name: enableClearAllDownloads
ClearAllDownloads.description: Enable option in settings to clear all downloads
ClearAllDownloads.native_description: Enable option in settings to clear all downloads

LeftSidebar.name: enableYLXSidebar
LeftSidebar.description: Enable Your Library X view of the left sidebar
LeftSidebar.native_description: Enable Your Library X view of the left sidebar

RightSidebar.name: enableRightSidebar
RightSidebar.description: Enable the view on the right sidebar
RightSidebar.native_description: Enable the view on the right sidebar

AddPlaylistToPlaylist.name: enableAddPlaylistToPlaylist
AddPlaylistToPlaylist.description: Enable support for adding a playlist to another playlist
AddPlaylistToPlaylist.native_description: Enable support for adding a playlist to another playlist

RightSidebarLyrics.name: enableRightSidebarLyrics
RightSidebarLyrics.description: Show lyrics in the right sidebar (disables lyrics on bottom bar)
RightSidebarLyrics.native_description: Show lyrics in the right sidebar

RightSidebarColors.name: enableRightSidebarExtractedColors
RightSidebarColors.description: Extract background color based on artwork image
RightSidebarColors.native_description: Extract background color based on artwork image

PlaybackSpeedIncrements.name: enableSmallPlaybackSpeedIncrements
PlaybackSpeedIncrements.description: playback speed range from 0.5-3.5 with every 0.1 increment (in podcasts)
PlaybackSpeedIncrements.native_description: playback speed range from 0.5-3.5 with every 0.1 increment

ShowFollowsSetting.name: enableShowFollowsSetting
ShowFollowsSetting.description: Enable a setting to control if followers and following lists are shown on profile
ShowFollowsSetting.native_description: Enable a setting to control if followers and following lists are shown on profile

RightSidebarCredits.name: enableRightSidebarCredits
RightSidebarCredits.description: Show credits in the right sidebar
RightSidebarCredits.native_description: Show credits in the right sidebar

WhatsNewFeed.name: enableWhatsNewFeed
WhatsNewFeed.description: Enable the what's new feed panel
WhatsNewFeed.native_description: Enable the what's new feed panel

WhatsNewFeedMainView.name: enableWhatsNewFeedMainView
WhatsNewFeedMainView.description: Enable Whats new feed in the main view
WhatsNewFeedMainView.native_description: Enable Whats new feed in the main view

RightSidebarArtistEnhanced.name: enableRightSidebarArtistEnhanced
RightSidebarArtistEnhanced.description: Enable Artist about V2 section in NPV
RightSidebarArtistEnhanced.native_description: Enable Artist about V2 section in NPV

ReadAlongTranscripts.name: enableReadAlongTranscripts
ReadAlongTranscripts.description: Enable read along transcripts in the NPV
ReadAlongTranscripts.native_description: Enable read along transcripts in the NPV

TogglePlaylistColumns.name: enableTogglePlaylistColumns
TogglePlaylistColumns.description: Enable ability to toggle playlist column visibility
TogglePlaylistColumns.native_description: Enable ability to toggle playlist column visibility

RightSidebarTransitionAnimations.name: enableRightSidebarTransitionAnimations
RightSidebarTransitionAnimations.description: Enable the slide-in/out transition on the right sidebar
RightSidebarTransitionAnimations.native_description: Enable the slide-in/out transition on the right sidebar

ConcertsInterested.name: enableConcertsInterested
ConcertsInterested.description: Enable Save and Retrieve feature for concerts
ConcertsInterested.native_description: Enable Save and Retrieve feature for concerts

ConcertsForThisIsPlaylist.name: enableConcertsForThisIsPlaylist
ConcertsForThisIsPlaylist.description: Enable Tour Card on This is Playlist
ConcertsForThisIsPlaylist.native_description: Enable Tour Card on This is Playlist

RemoteDownloads.name: enableRemoteDownloads
RemoteDownloads.description: Enable remote download support through the offline2 system
RemoteDownloads.native_description: Enable Tour Card on This is Playlist

AlbumCoverArtModal.name: enableAlbumCoverArtModal
AlbumCoverArtModal.description: Enable the cover art modal on the Album page
AlbumCoverArtModal.native_description: Enable the cover art modal on the Album page

ConcertsTicketPrice.name: enableConcertsTicketPrice
ConcertsTicketPrice.description: Display ticket price on Event page
ConcertsTicketPrice.native_description: Display ticket price on Event page

ButtonAlwaysVisible.name: saveButtonAlwaysVisible
ButtonAlwaysVisible.description: Display save button always in whats new feed
ButtonAlwaysVisible.native_description: Display save button always in whats new feed

NpvAboutPodcast.name: enableNpvAboutPodcast
NpvAboutPodcast.description: Enable About Podcast section in  NPV
NpvAboutPodcast.native_description: Enable About Podcast section in  NPV

QueueOnRightPanel.name: enableQueueOnRightPanel
QueueOnRightPanel.description: Enable Queue on the right panel
QueueOnRightPanel.native_description: Enable Queue on the right panel

RecentlyPlayedShortcut.name: enableRecentlyPlayedShortcut
RecentlyPlayedShortcut.description: Show Recently Played shortcut in home view. Also increase max number of shortcuts to 8
RecentlyPlayedShortcut.native_description: Show Recently Played shortcut in home view. Also increase max number of shortcuts to 8

EncoreCards.name: enableEncoreCards
EncoreCards.description: Enables all cards throughout app to be Encore Cards
EncoreCards.native_description: Enables all cards throughout app to be Encore Cards

Plus.name: enableAlignedCuration
Plus.description: it`s killing the heart icon, you`re able to save and choose the destination for any song, playlist, or podcast

ViewMode.name: enableViewMode
ViewMode.native_description: Enable list / compact mode in entity pages

UserTopContent.name: showUserTopContent
UserTopContent.description: Show top tracks and top artists on profile page
UserTopContent.native_description: Show top tracks and top artists on profile page

EightShortcuts.name: enableEightShortcuts
EightShortcuts.description: Increase max number of shortcuts on home to 8
EightShortcuts.native_description: Increase max number of shortcuts on home to 8

NPVCredits.name: enableNPVCredits
NPVCredits.description: Show credits in the right sidebar
NPVCredits.native_description: Show credits in the right sidebar

NPVCredits2.name: enableNPVCreditsWithLinkability
NPVCredits2.description: Show credits in the right sidebar
NPVCredits2.native_description: Show credits in the right sidebar

BanArtistAction.name: enableBanArtistAction
BanArtistAction.description: Enable context menu action to ban/unban artists
BanArtistAction.native_description: Enable context menu action to ban/unban artists

GlobalNavBar.name: enableGlobalNavBar
GlobalNavBar.description: Show global nav bar with home button, search input and user avatar
GlobalNavBar.native_description: Show global nav bar with home button, search input and user avatar

NotificationCenter.name: enableNotificationCenter
NotificationCenter.description: Enables notification center for desktop & web
NotificationCenter.native_description: Enables notification center for desktop & web

DevicePickerSidePanel.name: enableDevicePickerSidePanel
DevicePickerSidePanel.description: Enables Device Picker as a side panel (temporarily disabled until 1.2.36 because it was broken in version 1.2.37)
DevicePickerSidePanel.native_description: Enables Device Picker as a side panel

NewConnectBar.name: enableNewConnectBar
NewConnectBar.description: New Connect Bar without arrow and clickable elements
NewConnectBar.native_description: New Connect Bar without arrow and clickable elements

QueueOnRightPanelAnimations.name: enableQueueOnRightPanelAnimations
QueueOnRightPanelAnimations.description: Enable animations for Queue on the right panel
QueueOnRightPanelAnimations.native_description: Enable animations for Queue on the right panel

LikedSongsFilterTags.name: enableLikedSongsFilterTags
LikedSongsFilterTags.description: Show filter tags on the Liked Songs entity view
LikedSongsFilterTags.native_description: Show filter tags on the Liked Songs entity view

MiniPlayerVideo.name: enablePiPMiniPlayerVideo
MiniPlayerVideo.description: Enable playback of video inside the PiP Mini Player
MiniPlayerVideo.native_description: Enable playback of video inside the PiP Mini Player

PremiumUserForMiniPlayer.name: enablePremiumUserForMiniPlayer
PremiumUserForMiniPlayer.description: Enables premium user flag for mini player
PremiumUserForMiniPlayer.native_description: Enables premium user flag for mini player

HomeSubfeeds.name: enableHomeSubfeeds
HomeSubfeeds.description: Enable Subfeed filter chips on home
HomeSubfeeds.native_description: Enable Subfeed filter chips on home

SidebarAnimations.name: enableSidebarAnimations
SidebarAnimations.description: Enable animations on the left and right on the sidebars and makes the right sidebar collapsible
SidebarAnimations.native_description: Enable animations on the left and right on the sidebars and makes the right sidebar collapsible

RightSidebarCollapsible.name: enableRightSidebarCollapsible
RightSidebarCollapsible.description: Enable the right sidebar to collapse into the right margin
RightSidebarCollapsible.native_description: Enable the right sidebar to collapse into the right margin

Spotlight.name: enableSpotlight
Spotlight.description: adds a new section to the main page 'More like on...'
Spotlight.native_description: Enables the Spotlight component on home

SharingButtonOnMiniPlayer.name: enableSharingButtonOnMiniPlayer
SharingButtonOnMiniPlayer.description: Enables sharing button on MiniPlayer (this also moves the (+) icon close to the title)
SharingButtonOnMiniPlayer.native_description: Enables sharing button on MiniPlayer (this also moves the (+) icon close to the title)

PrereleaseRadar.name: enablePrereleaseRadar
PrereleaseRadar.description: Show a curated list of upcoming albums to a user
PrereleaseRadar.native_description: Show a curated list of upcoming albums to a user

AlignedCurationSavedIn.name: enableAlignedCurationSavedIn
AlignedCurationSavedIn.description: Enables the Saved In section in Aligned Curation
AlignedCurationSavedIn.native_description: Enables the Saved In section in Aligned Curation

Lyrics.name: enableLyrics
Lyrics.description: Feature flag that controls the availability of the lyrics feature
Lyrics.native_description: Feature flag that controls the availability of the lyrics feature

SocialConnectOnDesktop.name: enableSocialConnectOnDesktop
SocialConnectOnDesktop.description: Enable the Social Connect API that powers group listening sessions for Desktop
SocialConnectOnDesktop.native_description: Enable the Social Connect API that powers group listening sessions for Desktop

SocialConnectOnDesktopWebPlayer.name: enableSocialConnectOnDesktopWebPlayer
SocialConnectOnDesktopWebPlayer.description: Enable the Social Connect API that powers group listening sessions for Desktop Web Player
SocialConnectOnDesktopWebPlayer.native_description: Enable the Social Connect API that powers group listening sessions for Desktop Web Player

NavAlt.name: enableNavAltExperiment
NavAlt.description: Enable the new home structure and navigation
NavAlt.native_description: Enable the new home structure and navigation

NavAlt2.name: enableNavAltExperiment2
NavAlt2.description: Enable the new home structure and navigation
NavAlt2.native_description: Enable the new home structure and navigation

InternalTrackSearch.name: enableInternalTrackSearch
InternalTrackSearch.description: Enable internal track search on desktop UI
InternalTrackSearch.native_description: Enable internal track search on desktop UI

TrackRecommender.name: enableTrackInternalLinkRecommender
TrackRecommender.description: Enable internal link recommender component for track entity pages
TrackRecommender.native_description: Enable internal link recommender component for track entity pages

GlobalNavBar.name: enableGlobalNavBar
GlobalNavBar.description: Show global nav bar with home button, search input and user avatar
GlobalNavBar.native_description: Show global nav bar with home button, search input and user avatar

VideosPremiumUpsell.name: musicVideosPremiumUpsell
VideosPremiumUpsell.description: Testing Premium upsell for Free users on music videos
VideosPremiumUpsell.native_description: Testing Premium upsell for Free users on music videos

CanvasNpv.name: enableCanvasNpv
CanvasNpv.description: Enables short, looping visuals on tracks
CanvasNpv.native_description: Enables short, looping visuals on tracks
